summary: Diff addresses the loading/auth bootstrap with a new AuthGate flow, adds an authenticated-profile error UI with retry, and adjusts layout/header rendering. However, the profile data flow still relies on a placeholder role-based workaround rather than the real backend caller profile API, and several unrelated features (PWA, About/Admin enhancements) were added beyond the stated scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the caller profile data flow to use the real backend profile API (not placeholder role-based data), and ensure onboarding redirects only happen after the profile fetch has definitively completed.
missing_requirements.reason: The profile hook explicitly uses getCallerUserRole and returns a placeholder UserProfile (empty fields) to infer onboarding, stating that getCallerUserProfile is not exposed/used. The diff summary does not show corresponding backend/main.mo changes to expose a real getCallerUserProfile implementation, and the Profile/Header continue to consume this placeholder data.

hallucinated_features.description: PWA installability support (manifest, service worker registration, caching/offline strategy, meta tags).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest; non-goals emphasize avoiding new product features beyond fixing loading/auth/profile flow.

hallucinated_features.description: About page with app description and admin contact information.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of fixing the loading/auth/profile/onboarding/admin-check flow.

hallucinated_features.description: First-admin bootstrap/claim admin access hooks and related access-denied UI changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only mentions fixing existing admin-check flow robustness, not adding new admin-claim/bootstrap capabilities.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin invite token page enhancements and other admin UI changes unrelated to the loading/auth bootstrap fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside the targeted scope.
